text:
@McMasterU @MacRelStuds 'Explaining' Covid19 is as easy to science as 'explaining' all the other taxic side-effects of Consumerism. Simple artithmetic.
From global warming to cancer.
History only puts the scientific disasters in context.
'Do Unto the Future as You would have the Past do Unto Now.'
